jitter.description: Jitter NQA test that tests UDP-packet jitter.

icmp-jitter-input.description: Enable/disable ICMP jitter test instance input.

lsp-ping-input.description: Enable/disable LSP ping test instance input.

lsp-trace-input.description: Enable/disable LSP trace test instance input.

lsp-jitter-input.description: Enable/disable LSP jitter test instance input.

path-mtu-input.description: Enable/disable path mtu test instance input.

pwe3-trace-input.description: Enable/disable PWE3 trace test instance input.

mac-ping-input.description: Enable/disable MAC ping test instance input.

arp-ping-ip-input.description: Enable/disable arp ping IP test intance input.

path-jitter-input.description: Enable/disable path jitter test intance input.

vpls-mac-ping-input.description: Enable/disable VPLS MAC ping test instance input.

packet-size-list.description: Traffic packet size for ethernet packet.

items.description: Configure the ID of the test flow bound to the test instance.

result-num.description: The maximum number of test result records.

execution-policy.description: Statistics of the test instance execution policy.

at.description: Stop the test at the specified time.

delay.description: Stop the test after the specified delay time.

start-now-end-delay-seconds.description: The test instance end delay seconds.

lifetime.description: Stop the test after the specified life time.

start-now-end-lifetime-seconds.description: The test instance end lifetime seconds.

at.description: Stop the test at the specified time.

delay.description: Stop the test after the specified delay time.

start-at-end-delay-seconds.description: The test instance end delay seconds.

lifetime.description: Stop the test after the specified life time.

start-at-end-lifetime-seconds.description: The test instance end lifetime seconds.

start-delay.description: Delay some time then execute testcase.

start-delay-seconds.description: The test instance start delay seconds.

at.description: Stop the test at the specified time.

delay.description: Stop the test after the specified delay time.

start-delay-end-delay-seconds.description: The test instance end delay seconds.

lifetime.description: Stop the test after the specified life time.

start-delay-end-lifetime-seconds.description: The test instance end lifetime seconds.

nqa-execution-policy.description: Configure the test instance to be executed at the specified time.

start-date-time.description: The start date and time of the test instance. Detele the start-date-time to stop the test.

end-date-time.description: The end date and time of the test instance.

timeout.description: Time to wait for a response packet after a test packet is sent.

frequency.description:
Cyclic scheduling period of test cases. The frequency must be greater than the value of the following formula; otherwise, the test results may be inaccurate:
(number of sent packets - 1) * (packet sending interval) + (timeout period).

fail-percent.description: Indicates the packet loss ratio threshold of an NQA test instance. If the packet loss ratio exceeds the threshold, the test fails.

data-fill.description: Specify an NQA test packet payload string.

pass-route.description: Enable/disable the function of sending packets without searching for routes.

probe-fails.description: The maximum number of probe failures of an NQA test to send trap or events.

test-fails.description: The maximum number of the NQA test consecutive test failures to send trap or events.

compatibility.description: Enable/disable compatibility mode. When the ptn79 interworks with the ptn39, the no result is converted to failed and success.

result-num.description: The maximum number of test result records.

history-num.description: The maximum number of historical test records.

threshold-rtd.description: Threshold value of round trip delay.

hardware-enable.description: Enable/disable packets are sent by hardware.

pass-route.description: Enable/disable the function of sending packets without searching for routes.

threshold-owd-ds.description: One way delay threshold value from destination to source.

threshold-owd-sd.description: One way delay threshold value from source to destination.

test-failtimes.description: The maximum number of the NQA test consecutive test failures to send trap or events.

vlan-tag-config.description: VLAN configuration selection. One VLAN tag or two VLAN tags can be configured.

one-vlan-tag.description: One VLAN tag can be configured.

two-vlan-tag.description: Two VLAN tags can be configured.

color-mode.description: Color mode of a test flow.

color-blind.description: The color mode is color blind.

blind-priority-type.description: The priority type when color mode is color-blind.

color-blind-8021p.description: The start 802.1p priority when color mode is color-blind.

color-blind-dscp.description: The start DSCP priority when color mode is color-blind.

color-aware.description: The color mode is color aware.

aware-priority-type.description: The priority type when color mode is color-aware.

color-aware-green-8021p.description: The start 802.1p priority of green packets when the color mode is color-aware.

color-aware-yellow-8021p.description: The start 802.1p priority of yellow packets when the color mode is color-aware.

color-aware-green-dscp.description: The start DSCP priority of green packets when the color mode is color-aware.

color-aware-yellow-dscp.description: The start DSCP priority of yellow packets when the color mode is color-aware.

dest-mac.description: The destination MAC address will be set to a range.

increment-dest-mac.description: The incremental range of destination MAC addresses.

dest-mac-mask.description: The mask of destination MAC address. After conversion to binary, the positions of 1s must be consecutive, and the number of consecutive 1s cannot be less than 1 or greater than 32.

source-mac.description: The source MAC address will be set to a range.

increment-src-mac.description: The incremental range of source MAC addresses.

src-mac-mask.description: The mask of source MAC address. After conversion to binary, the positions of 1s must be consecutive, and the number of consecutive 1s cannot be less than 1 or greater than 32.

dest-ipv4.description: The destination IPv4 address will be set to a range.

increment-dest-ipv4.description: The incremental range of destination IPv4 addresses.

dest-ipv4-mask.description: The mask of destination IPv4 address. After conversion to binary, the positions of 1s must be consecutive, and the number of consecutive 1s cannot be less than 1 or greater than 32.

source-ipv4.description: The source IPv4 address will be set to a range.

increment-src-ipv4.description: The incremental range of source IPv4 addresses.

src-ipv4-mask.description: The mask of source IPv4 address. After conversion to binary, the positions of 1s must be consecutive, and the number of consecutive 1s cannot be less than 1 or greater than 32.

dest-port.description: The destination UDP port will be set to a range.

source-port.description: The source UDP port will be set to a range.

vlan-id.description: The VLAN ID will be set to a range.

ce-vid.description: The CE VLAN ID will be set to a range.

color-blind-8021p.description: The 802.1p priority value in color-blind mode will be set to a range.

end-color-blind-8021p.description: The end 802.1p priority when color mode is color-blind.

color-blind-dscp.description: The DSCP priority value in color-blind mode will be set to a range.

end-color-blind-dscp.description: The end dscp priority when color mode is color-blind.

color-aware-8021p.description: The 802.1p priority value in color-aware mode will be set to a range.

end-color-aware-green-8021p.description: The end 802.1p priority of green packets when color mode is color-aware.

end-color-aware-yellow-8021p.description: The end 802.1p priority of yellow packets when color mode is color-aware.

color-aware-dscp.description: The DSCP priority value in color-aware mode will be set to a range.

end-color-aware-green-dscp.description: The end DSCP priority of green packets when color mode is color-aware.

end-color-aware-yellow-dscp.description: The end DSCP priority of yellow packets when color mode is color-aware.

flr.description: Value of frame loss rate in per 100000.
